Uses of Class
Coordinate

    • Uses of Coordinate in <Unnamed>

      Methods in <Unnamed> that return Coordinate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Coordinate Board.getClick()
      Waits for user to click somewhere and then returns the click.
      Coordinate Board.getLastCord()
      Returns the last cord in the grid that was highlighted pre: selections can't be empty post: the last element of arrayList selections is returned
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Coordinate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Board.addLetter(Coordinate c)
      Adds the letter at coordinate c to the word array to create a word pre: none post: Letter at coordinate c is added to the word array list
      void Board.addSelection(Coordinate c)
      Adds the clicked grid coordinate to the selections array list Pre: c > 0 Post: Argument c is added to selections array list and the board is repainted to update the highlighted cords
      boolean Board.isAdjacent(Coordinate c1, Coordinate c2)
      Checks if the last selected cord has other selected cords adjacent to it pre: none post: a boolean is returned
      boolean Board.isLastCord(Coordinate c)
      Checks if the coordinate argument matches the last selected cord pre: none post: A boolean is returned
      boolean Board.isSelected(Coordinate c)
      Checks if c is a coordinate within the selections array list Pre: none Post: A boolean is returned
      void Board.removeLetter(Coordinate c)
      Removes the letter at coordinate c to the word array to create a word pre: none post: Letter at coordinate c is removed from the word array list
      void Board.removeSelection(Coordinate c)
      Removes the clicked grid coordinate from the selections array list Pre: c > 0 Post: Argument c is removed from the selections array list and the board is repainted to update the highlighted cords
